subject: Golf
PGA Championship
lead_paragraph: Brian Harman held off Zach Johnson by one stroke in the PGA Tour’s John Deere Classic. Mo Martin became a major champion for the first time at the Women’s British Open.
snippet: Brian Harman held off Zach Johnson by one stroke in the PGA Tour’s John Deere Classic. Mo Martin became a major champion for the first time at the Women’s British Open.
